Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory46.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: 'The extra thing I asked you to prepare, how is it coming along, Asimov?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Had a few hiccups. Still working on it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'As you know, the Task Force classifies combat zones based on their Punishing Virus intensity.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Most people are familiar with the three major categories of combat zones: high, middle, and low. But there's a fourth: Dead Zones.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "A lot can be said about Dead Zones, but to sum it up in one sentence: we can't go in there unprotected—not even after we get a serum injection.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "So, in order to protect the M.I.N.D. stability of Constructs in Dead Zones, we've upgraded the link chamber.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Asimov', 3: "I will spare you the details about the link chamber. All you need to know, which you already do, is that it's a machine that allows Commandant to command Constructs remotely.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "I heard you've tried remote command on several teams now.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Only a handful... And we expect that only Cerberus will adopt the technique in the end.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Ever since remote connection was abolished, it has been excluded by military schools from Commandant assessment criteria. As a result, the available sample are few and far between.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Most of the registered Commandants have no access to the link chamber. Even if they do—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'The Constructs still have their limitations. They can only get to the outermost part of a Dead Zone. If they try going any deeper, malfunctions occur immediately...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'So do you mean to tell me that the program has failed, Asimov?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: '"Fail" is a word I never said and never will say.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Me and my technicians are ready to move on to phase two. We have plenty of time to pick a Commandant, but right now we need to have the Constructs overhauled.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "Overhaul? The way you did with Gray Raven's Constructs?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Only more radical... I'm going to develop new models that are truly fit for purpose.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'And how do you plan to do it?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Asimov lowers his voice. Only the word "Corrupted" is faintly heard from his mouth.'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Are you serious?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'If you approve it, yes.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'At this moment, Asimov hands over two files. One is a report filled with numbers... the other is a Level 2 classified document.'}
